meanings.definition: Bring (goods or services) into a country from abroad for sale.
meanings.sent1: The store imports fresh fruits from other countries to sell.
meanings.sent2: The company imports electronics from overseas suppliers.
meanings.sent3: The chef decided to import exotic spices to add a unique touch to the dishes.
meanings.sent4: She imports creativity from different cultures to enhance her artwork.
meanings.sent5: The garden imports colorful flowers to create a vibrant display.

meanings.definition: Bring (data) into a file or document from another source.
meanings.sent1: The student imports images from the internet to include in the presentation.
meanings.sent2: The software program imports information from the database automatically.
meanings.sent3: He likes to import jokes into his emails to make them more entertaining.
meanings.sent4: The writer imports inspiration from real-life events to enrich the story.
meanings.sent5: The app imports user preferences to personalize the experience.
